meta.title: Vocal and Piano Lessons in Limassol • Inna Gurina • Vocal and Piano Teacher
meta.description: Welcome to Vocal and Piano Lessons in Limassol. I am Inna, a professional vocal and piano teacher with 12 years of experience, offering personalized lessons for all ages in both Russian and English.
meta.keywords: Vocal lessons in Limassol, Piano lessons in Limassol, Vocal and piano teacher in Limassol, Limassol vocal coach, Limassol piano teacher

header.title: Vocal and Piano Lessons in Limassol
header.intro: Inna Gurina. Vocal coach. Songwriter. Bachelor of Art Creative Music Technology.

about.badge: Inna Gurina - Professional Vocal and Piano Teacher
about.missionText1: I help singers uncover the unique sound of their voice, guiding them towards healthy, effortless, and expressive singing that truly reflects their personality. My goal is to create a safe and creative space where your voice can fully develop.
about.missionText3: Education in Creative Music Technology from University of Hull
about.missionText5: 12 years of teaching experience in Cyprus

location.title: Location
location.address: The studio is located in the Germasogeia area

teachingSpace.title: Teaching Space
teachingSpace.description: I conduct most of my lessons in a specially equipped studio. I also offer Skype and Zoom lessons in both Russian and English.

cta.getInTouch: Get in touch with me to schedule your first lesson
